item.title: SRePlay - Replay Protection Bypass
item.description: Background During a Pentest, we came across a scenario where the application was sending a token in response which will be used in the next request so that it can prevent request replay. On top of that, we can’t use macros to send requests for tokens due to limitations. To overcome this challenge, we developed a SRePlay, Burp Plugin to bypass Replay Protection which will extract the value of the token from the last response and automatically update the future request with the new token on the fly resulting in Request Replay Protection bypass.
